PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-09762014-09-25,  DESD,  CEIC,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to align the Regulations with the specific amendments made to the Employment Insurance Act as a result of the Economic Action Plan 2014 Act, No. 1 to ensure that all compassionate care benefits or parents of critically ill children benefits claimants can benefit from this flexibility.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0214 Publication Date: 2014-10-08
AttachmentsAttachment
